messages.message:
I was playing around with a chatbot in `Prod` and noticed that there was some minor prompt leaking that may have occurred.

*Screenshot1:*
Turn 0: I request a summary of the document. A numeric string following a common date format is in the title.
Turn 1: Agent responds w/ a summary. Agent also mentions that the report date is July 25, 2024 -- the date when this response occurred.

Turn 3: I request a rationale for why/how the agent determined the report date.
Turn 4: Agent mentions in reply:
> "Today is Jul 25 2024" at the beginning of the text.
Sharing in case it's helpful :memo:
